scheme_name: Technology Development And Utilization Programme For Women
description: The Technology Development and Utilization Programme for Women, implemented by the Department of Science and Technology, provides financial assistance to projects and institutions developing technologies that benefit women. It aims to promote gender-friendly technological innovations.

benefits.financial_assistance: Up to Rs. 50 Lakhs per project, depending on scope
benefits.technical_support: Access to expert guidance and resources

organization_criteria: Must have expertise in technology development
project_criteria: Projects must develop technologies benefiting women

eligible_activities: Research and development of women-centric technologies

steps: Visit the Department of Science and Technology portal
Submit an online application with a detailed project proposal
Upload required documents, including institutional registration and project plan
Applications are evaluated by a technical committee
Approved projects receive funding in phases
application_process.note: Funding is released based on project milestones
